synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Iodine uptake was measured gravimetrically; samples were loaded to targeted amounts by monitoring the iodine diffusion rate with time, and intermediate weight-ins.
Weakly surface-adsorbed I2 and water were removed by heating the samples at 400 K for 1 h.

synthesis_conditions.materials_used: 1 g of activated powder ZIF-8 and 2mL of water
equipment: Micromeritics ASAP 2020 surface area and porosity analyzer
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The sample was extruded from a homogeneous paste to individual cylindrical pellets of approximately 3mm in diameter and 10mm in length. Activated to remove any water content.
